tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP miss) (NP (NP (DT both)) (PP (IN of) (NP (PRP$ my) (JJS best) (NNS friends)))) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT the) (JJ whole) (JJ wide) (NN world)))) (. .)))
